lyric:
[by:刘玄明童鞋]
[ti:Rather Be]
[ar:Jess Glynne]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.00]
[00:09.00]Oh
[00:16.77]We're a thousand miles from comfort
[00:20.62]We have traveled land and sea
[00:24.55]But as long as you are with me
[00:28.95]There's no place I'd rather be
[00:32.99]I would wait forever
[00:36.75]Exalted in the scene
[00:40.90]As long as I am with you
[00:44.83]My heart continues to beat
[00:49.06]With every step we take
[00:51.00]Kyoto to The Bay
[00:52.73]Strolling so casually
[00:56.98]We're different and the same
[00:58.89]Gave you another name
[01:00.55]Switch up the batteries
[01:04.51]If you gave me a chance I would take it
[01:08.82]It's a shot in the dark but I'll make it
[01:12.51]Know with all of your heart, you can't shame me
[01:16.37]When I am with you
[01:18.44]There's no place I'd rather be
[01:20.88]N-n-n-no no no
[01:22.81]No place I'd rather be
[01:24.87]N-n-n-no no no
[01:26.86]No place I'd rather be
[01:28.81]N-n-n-no no no
[01:30.71]No place I'd rather be
[01:32.76]Ooh ooh
[01:36.45]We staked out on a mission
[01:40.20]To find our inner peace
[01:44.27]Make it everlasting so nothing's incomplete
[01:52.19]It's easy being with you, sacred simplicity
[02:00.07]As long as we're together
[02:04.03]There's no place I'd rather be

[02:49.91]No place I'd rather be
[02:52.16]When I am with you, there's no place I'd rather be

[03:01.06]Hoo
[03:03.95](Be)

tlyric:
[by:刘玄明童鞋]
[00:09.00]噢
[00:16.77]安逸与我们相隔万里
[00:20.62]我们赤足跋涉千山万水
[00:24.55]只要有你相伴
[00:28.95]我就无处想去
[00:32.99]愿永远守候着你
[00:36.75]为你每一次露面欣喜
[00:40.90]只要有你相伴
[00:44.83]我的心就小鹿乱撞
[00:49.06]一步步小心翼翼
[00:51.00]京都海湾处歇脚
[00:52.73]步伐随意散漫
[00:56.98]我们不同又相似
[00:58.89]取了各自的名字
[01:00.55]充足能量 继续前行
[01:04.51]你若给我机会 我会紧紧抓住
[01:08.82]茫茫夜色中一抹亮色 我会尽力出彩
[01:12.51]毫不犹豫地的相信着你 你不会让我失望
[01:16.37]只要有你相伴
[01:18.44]所到之处都是天堂
[01:20.88]不不不
[01:22.81]我无处想去
[01:24.87]不不不
[01:26.86]只要有你
[01:28.81]不不不
[01:30.71]只想和你在一起
[01:32.76]噢
[01:36.45]一路跌跌撞撞
[01:40.20]去寻找内心的平静
[01:44.27]努力让其永恒 没有什么可以取代
[01:52.19]和你在一起感觉很好 简单舒服
[02:00.07]只要有你相伴
